item.title: Why the Basecamp way of product management hasn't worked for us
item.description: A few weeks ago, Jonas Downey from Basecamp posted an article about how they handle software changes while keeping their customers happy. The topics covered are eerily relevant to a recent initiative at Cratejoy. I want to share how I think about and deal with what we define as “product debt.” If you haven’t read it, Downey’s central point is that to keep customers happy, you simply can’t remove features.
